nodes.text: The Bajic sector, also known as Baji sector, was a sector located in the Outer Rim Territories. Planets included Talofan, Verisin, Yasilor, and Sperin. Bajic also contained the Vergesso Asteroids. Bajic was, at one point, represented in the Galactic Senate by Fema Baab. During Imperial rule, the sector was governed by Grand Moff Kintaro.
The Bajic sector was also home to the Tenloss Criminal Syndicate. Black Sun ran spice operations there as well.
